title._content: Kalurinaised rannas töötamas / Fishermen’s wives working on the beach

description._content: Kalurinaised rannas töötamas. Üks olulisi töid oli adru vedamine, mida kasutati viljatul liivapinnasel väetisena. Sealsamas puhkab pikast merelolekust väsinud kalur. - - - Fishermen’s wives working on the beach. Collecting seaweed was important work, as it was used to fertilize the sandy and unfruitful soil. Next to the women we can see a tired fisherman resting. ca 1900 Viitekood / Reference code: EAA.1451.1.109.2.4 Kirje andmebaasis FOTIS / Description in the database FOTIS: www.ra.ee/fotis/index.php?type=2&id=9522
